p: The Directory allows you to download all data contained in different formats.

ul.li: The Directory XML data can be downloaded via the URLs /export/businesscards (including all document types) /export/businesscards-xml-no-doc-types (excluding all document types) .
The response MIME type is always application/xml.
Responses should be cached up to 24 hours.
The data is updated once a day. Exports start at 02:00 a.m. UTC.
The XML Schema for the XML responses can be downloaded from /files/directory-export-v3.xsd
The Directory JSON data can be downloaded via the URL /export/businesscards-json.
The response MIME type is always application/json.
Responses should be cached up to 24 hours.
The data is updated once a day. Exports start at 02:00 a.m. UTC.
The Directory CSV data can be downloaded via the URL /export/businesscards-csv.
The response MIME type is always text/csv.
Responses should be cached up to 24 hours.
The data is updated once a day. Exports start at 02:00 a.m. UTC.
